mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM auth_user_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN auth_role r ON ar.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN auth_role_permission_relation rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN auth_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE ar.admin_id = #{adminId} AND p.id IS NOT NULL AND p.id NOT IN ( SELECT p.id FROM auth_role_permission_relation pr LEFT JOIN auth_permission p ON pr.permission_id = p.id WHERE # pr.type = - 1 pr.role_id = #{adminId} )
